summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Context Intelligence Platform. All backend APIs (100% success rate) and frontend functionality working correctly. Dashboard displays proper stats, all 3 use cases functional with search capabilities, navigation works, and LLM integration generates responses successfully.
passed_tests: Dashboard loads with 3 use case cards
Dashboard shows correct stats (5 Data Sources, 148 Entities, 212 Connections, 9 Weekly Summaries)
Knowledge Base search returns results with sources and weeks covered
Incident Analysis returns RCA report with tabs (Report, Timeline, Related Items)
AI Companion role selector works (Engineer, Product Manager, Engineering Manager)
All search functionalities return LLM-generated responses
